message.name: ERR_CASECONTRACT_XFV_STARTDATE
message.locale: Contract start date cannot be greater than the end date.

message.name: ERR_CASECONTRACT_XFV_START_DATE_CASE_START_DATE
message.locale: Contract start date must not be earlier than the case creation date.

message.name: ERR_CASECONTRACT_FV_FILEPRINTED
message.locale: Contract cannot be modified after it has been printed.

message.name: ERR_CASECONTRACT_FV_STARTDATE
message.locale: Contract start date must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_CASECONTRACT_FV_ENDDATE
message.locale: Contract end date must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_CASECONTRACT_RV_CLIENT_UNREGISTERED
message.locale: The Client for whom the Contract is being created must be registered.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACT_TO_DATE_FV_TASK_DUE_DATE
message.locale: One or more tasks exist on the contract with due dates later than the modified contract end date.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACT_FROM_DATE_FV_TASK_DUE_DATE
message.locale: One or more tasks exist on the contract with due dates earlier than the modified contract start date.

message.name: ERR_CONTRACT_FOR_PROSPECT_PERSON
message.locale: A contract cannot be created for a Prospect Person. Please register the Prospect Person as a Person.
